fields.name: index
fields.description: The field for the index record component.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The field for the type record component.

fields.name: direction
fields.description: The field for the direction record component.

fields.name: encoder
fields.description: The field for the encoder record component.

fields.name: decoder
fields.description: The field for the decoder record component.

fields.name: consumer
fields.description: The field for the consumer record component.

constructors.name: Message
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a Message record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: index
methods.description: Returns the value of the index record component.

methods.name: type
methods.description: Returns the value of the type record component.

methods.name: direction
methods.description: Returns the value of the direction record component.

methods.name: encoder
methods.description: Returns the value of the encoder record component.

methods.name: decoder
methods.description: Returns the value of the decoder record component.

methods.name: consumer
methods.description: Returns the value of the consumer record component.
